content: 2 eggs crochet rounds 1-11 of the pattern for the eggs in color rose make 2 chain a length of cord in color dusty light green that fits around the pouch twice see 1st photo below take the hook out of the st insert the hook through the magic_ring of 1 of the incomplete eggs insert the hook from the inside of the egg to the outside grab the chain stitch and pull it into the egg see 2nd photo below take the hook out of the chain stich again the loop of the chain is inside the egg insert the hook in a different hole near the magic_ring of the egg this time insert from the outside of the egg to the inside of the egg grab the chain stitch and pull it to the outside of the egg see 3rd photo below slip_stitch along the complete length of the cord back to the 1st chain of the cord fasten_off leave the yarn ends there you will need those later lay the pouch flat in front of you start at either side of the pouch use a darning needle to thread the end of the crocheted cord the side without the half egg through the loops at the top of the pouch see 1st photo on page 12 when the cord is threaded through all the loops all around you can attach the other half egg to that side of the cord with a darning needle insert each yarn end of the cord through a different hole near the magic_ring of the 2nd half egg see 2nd photo on page 12 tie those 2 yarn ends together tightly you do not need to work those yarn ends away they are inside the egg finish crocheting those 2 unfinished eggs using the pattern for the eggs © tic-tac-toe egg game by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2024 11 congratulations you have completed your own tic-tac-toe egg game i can t wait to see your version of this game so please don t forget to use hashtag #tictactoeegggame and @bokkyshome that way you can be sure that i will get to admire your creations a lot of time and effort was put into designing and writing this pattern this pattern is for personal use only finished items may be sold but please be sure to mention @bokkyshome as the designer you are not allowed to share and/or distribute this pattern or any part of it as your own you are not allowed to copy film or use any part of this pattern as your own © tic-tac-toe egg game by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2024 12
